1.title: Men... The Real Victims

episode of.title: SIT Presents Men... The Real Victims (TV Series 2015– )

1.plot: The first episode of this web series presents a humorous take on how women take forever to decide what to wear and what not to when they have to go out.

2.title: Cricket Vs Women

episode of.title: SIT Presents Men... The Real Victims (TV Series 2015– )

2.plot: Ashwin attempts to convince Shalini to go out with him and watch the IPL final with his friends.

3.title: My Annoying Wife

episode of.title: SIT Presents Men... The Real Victims (TV Series 2015– )

3.plot: Stuck in a traffic jam and getting late for a party, Ashwin tries everything but always finds himself at the receiving end of Shalini's anger.

4.title: How to Deal with 2 GFs Together

episode of.title: SIT Presents Men... The Real Victims (TV Series 2015– )

4.plot: Aseem believes he can handle the situation when his ex-girlfriend comes across his current girlfriend but everything that he does gives out unexpected results.

5.title: You Don't Love Me Anymore

episode of.title: SIT Presents Men... The Real Victims (TV Series 2015– )

5.plot: A husband may try his best, but his wife will always manage to find shortcomings in his love for her. Ashwin discovers this harsh reality about women in this episode.

6.title: My Rocking B'day Party

episode of.title: SIT Presents Men... The Real Victims (TV Series 2015– )

6.plot: Ashwin wants to celebrate his birthday in a big way but then Shalini steps in and plans his birthday party in a way he could have never imagined.

7.title: Kiss Me Baby

episode of.title: SIT Presents Men... The Real Victims (TV Series 2015– )

7.plot: Ashwin realizes that anytime is not the right time to kiss your wife, but if the wife wants to kiss him he must always make time.

8.title: Do Not Disturb

episode of.title: SIT Presents Men... The Real Victims (TV Series 2015– )

8.plot: Every morning Ashwin tries hard not to disturb Shalini when he wakes up, but on Sunday when he does want to sleep longer he wakes up to a rude shock.

9.title: How to Romance Your Wife

episode of.title: SIT Presents Men... The Real Victims (TV Series 2015– )

9.plot: Ashwin decides to cook food for Shalini so as to prove that he too can be a romantic husband.

10.title: Boy's Night Out - Part 1

episode of.title: SIT Presents Men... The Real Victims (TV Series 2015– )

10.plot: Ashwin is planning a boy's night out with his friends, but as usual there lies an obstacle in his path....Shalini, his wife.

11.title: Boy's Night Out - Part 2

episode of.title: SIT Presents Men... The Real Victims (TV Series 2015– )

11.plot: Ashwin desperately wants to go out with his friends this time after having failed to do so on previous occasions thanks to Shalini, but will he succeed ?

12.title: Why Girls Breakup!! One Can Never Know

episode of.title: SIT Presents Men... The Real Victims (TV Series 2015– )

12.plot: What is the root cause of a break-up ? What do women really want from men ? Four women try to explain.

13.title: How Lucky Are You??

episode of.title: SIT Presents Men... The Real Victims (TV Series 2015– )

13.plot: Ashwin realizes that praising someone's wife in front of your own wife can have disastrous consequences.

14.title: Guess What She Wants??

episode of.title: SIT Presents Men... The Real Victims (TV Series 2015– )

14.plot: How difficult can it be to order a simple sandwich ? Ashwin finds out when he orders one for Shalini.

15.title: Happy Diwali

episode of.title: SIT Presents Men... The Real Victims (TV Series 2015– )

15.plot: It's Diwali, so Ashwin plans to play cards with his friends and have fun, but all his plans go down the drain when Shalini steps in and decides to play as well.

16.title: DJ Wale Babu

episode of.title: SIT Presents Men... The Real Victims (TV Series 2015– )

16.plot: Ashwin and Shalini go out to have a drink in a club, where Shalini gives specific instructions to Ashwin on how much can he drink.

17.title: How Girls Shop

episode of.title: SIT Presents Men... The Real Victims (TV Series 2015– )

17.plot: Ashwin and Shalini go out for shopping. What seems like a routine affair for Shalini turns out to be an excruciatingly painful experience for Ashwin.

18.title: How to Make Her Jealous

episode of.title: SIT Presents Men... The Real Victims (TV Series 2015– )

18.plot: Ashwin visits his former employers house for dinner along with Shalini. While Ashwin has quite a good time there, Shalini on the other hand gets another reason to nag him.

19.title: Why Do Girls Cry

episode of.title: SIT Presents Men... The Real Victims (TV Series 2015– )

19.plot: Shedding tears is the strongest defense mechanism of women with which they can defend themselves from pretty much any accusation. Ashwin learns this lesson the hard way when he goes out with Shalini to celebrate their anniversary.

20.title: New Year Resolutions

episode of.title: SIT Presents Men... The Real Victims (TV Series 2015– )

20.plot: It's Christmas and Shalini decides to make some new year resolutions. She wishes to become a better person and companion by making changes in the way she lives her life. But does she really want to do that ?

21.title: Girls Are Always Right

episode of.title: SIT Presents Men... The Real Victims (TV Series 2015– )

21.plot: Can a husband ever win an argument with his wife ? Does a wife have it in her to concede defeat ? Find out what happens when Ashwin and Shalini argue over simple things.

22.title: Girls Love Freebies

episode of.title: SIT Presents Men... The Real Victims (TV Series 2015– )

22.plot: Ashwin arrives to pick up Shalini but is shocked to know the real reason why Shalini called him there.

23.title: My Way or The Highway

episode of.title: SIT Presents Men... The Real Victims (TV Series 2015– )

23.plot: Shalini goes out for a workout giving Ashwin a bucketful of things to take care of. But will Ashwin be able to complete everything successfully ? More importantly, will he manage to live up to her expectations ?

24.title: Sunday Is Funday

episode of.title: SIT Presents Men... The Real Victims (TV Series 2015– )

24.plot: It's Sunday and Ashwin wants to just relax and enjoy by doing nothing. But how can he afford such a luxury as long as Shalini is around ?

25.title: The Missing Passport

episode of.title: SIT Presents Men... The Real Victims (TV Series 2015– )

25.plot: Shalini's passport has gone missing and she blames Ashwin for misplacing it, while Ashwin blames her instead. So what is the truth behind the missing passport and who is the culprit ?

26.title: How Girls Clean Their Cupboards

episode of.title: SIT Presents Men... The Real Victims (TV Series 2015– )

26.plot: Shalini's cupboard is overflowing with clothes so she decides to get rid of some old ones which she doesn't wear anymore. How difficult can it be to complete such a simple task ?

27.title: Where to Go for Dinner

episode of.title: SIT Presents Men... The Real Victims (TV Series 2015– )

27.plot: Shalini wants to go out for dinner and asks Ashwin to select a place. Does Ashwin get to eat the food of his choice at the place of his choice or does he get manipulated into going where Shalini wants to go and eat whatever she wants to ?

imdb.title: SIT Presents Men... The Real Victims
akas: SIT Presents Men... The Real Victims (India)
plot: A funny take on the problems faced by a married couple in their day to day lives.
